spec_data.Name: alsa-plugins-oss
spec_data.Description:
This plugin converts the ALSA API over OSS API.  With this plugin,
ALSA native apps can run on OSS drivers.

This plugin provides the PCM type "oss".
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 14 Nov 2017 04:48:45 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Oss PCM output plugin for ALSA
